Articles.Content:
Hi peeps,

Kind of new to this game and having a torid time trying to dock etc, yes I've watched all the videos on the subject and still have not been able to do it. Any how I was looking at the Mech Jeb plug in and wondering if it may help?

The problem I have is that I'm not sure how to install it as I've got the game from Steam, so can any one advise me to how to go about installing this plugin?

Thanks in advance.
Extract the contents of the zip to the GameData folder in your KSP installation.

MechJeb is really good for beginners, and once you get a feel for the game, start doing stuff yourself. I use MechJeb to plot my landing trajectory, but the final approach and landing are all done by hand, as MechJeb likes being a bit inaccurate and lazy with landing on target.
